category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 15 (Safe Work Council)
contents: Article 15 (Safe Work Council) ① The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall consult with the Corporation's National Safety and Security Committee to discuss important matters related to safety and health in accordance with Article 12 of the “Guidelines for Safety Management of Public Institutions” (hereinafter referred to as *Safety Management Guidelines). A safe work council composed of representatives of the company's labor and management must be operated., ② The chairman of the board must operate a safe work council at least once a quarter to collect suggestions and opinions from suppliers' labor and management representatives., ③ Safety and health-related suggestions. Opinions such as these are deliberated and resolved by the Sanitary Safety and Security Commission. Revised December 16, 2022, ④ The chairman must inform all workers and contractors of the results of the meeting through documents, etc.
